name: Obsidian - (ODN) RES fix
description: Reddit Enhancement Suite fix for Obsidian (ODN) subreddit.
additional_info:
Reload the page after installing this style if you don't see it show up.

Their will still be one white area or more but this cannot be fixed. The css is backed into the html as a style tag with important rule added. Impossible to over ride. AT least the text is readable on all pages now.
